title: How to Make Cucumber Pasta

steps.headline: Wash and dice the cucumbers into small chunks using a knife.
Boil the spaghetti noodles in a large pot of water until the pasta is cooked and slightly tender.
Drain the noodles using a colander.
Melt the butter on the pot and sprinkle the salt and pepper.
Place the pasta back into the pot with the melted butter.
Drizzle the lemon juice and add the lemon zest over the pasta.
Fold in the cucumbers and mix with a wooden spoon.
Serve.
steps.description: Scoop the cucumber pasta into serving bowls. Garnish with the cropped fresh mint. Enjoy!

text: Wash and dice the cucumbers into small chunks using a knife.  Boil the spaghetti noodles in a large pot of water until the pasta is cooked and slightly tender.  Drain the noodles using a colander.  Melt the butter on the pot and sprinkle the salt and pepper.  Place the pasta back into the pot with the melted butter. Stir around with a spoon. Drizzle the lemon juice and add the lemon zest over the pasta.  Fold in the cucumbers and mix with a wooden spoon.  Serve. Scoop the cucumber pasta into serving bowls. Garnish with the cropped fresh mint. Enjoy!
